name: MOIRAI (itch) (BeardedAnts)
description:
Moirai Scientific Station. Days since last contact: 43.
Your mission. Collect 5 log files to find out what happened to the crew.

This is an unfinished prototype made as a part of the Metroidvania Month 8. 
https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-8

We had issues with bones in enemies so they are not up to the standard we were hoping to do.

How to Play

W,S,A,D - Move
Space - Jump
L - Shoot
M - Slide
K - Change Arrow

Game by:

  • Anthony Reed
  • Corey Underdown
  • Jon Coates

Music by Josie Broughton
